short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pauses all videos in all tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is intended to help people who have lots (maybe even hundreds!) of tabs open. When they restore all those tabs at once, their open videos might start playing! Instead of having to search through all the open windows and pause the videos one by one, this extension gives a simple button that pauses every video at once.
